org.fcrepo.http.api.repository

Class FedoraRepositoryTransactions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource
      • org.fcrepo.http.api.FedoraBaseResource
        • org.fcrepo.http.api.FedoraTransactions
          • org.fcrepo.http.api.repository.FedoraRepositoryTransactions

  • @Scope(value="prototype")
 @Path(value="/fcr:tx")
public class FedoraRepositoryTransactions
extends FedoraTransactions
    This stub is a hack to mount the functionality of FedoraTransactions at the root of this webapp. Without it, the globbing from FedoraNodes would own this path instead.
    Author:
    awoods
